targets.rawSql:
SELECT sec_code, sum(vol) as "разница объемов" FROM (
  SELECT toStartOfInterval(time, INTERVAL ${interval} MINUTE) as "minute", sec_code, if(buy_sell == 'S', -1, 1) * sum(price * quantity * s.lotsize) as "vol"
  FROM "default"."transaq_trades" JOIN default.transaq_securities s on (transaq_trades.sec_code = s.seccode and transaq_trades.board = s.board)
  WHERE sec_code not in [$sec_code_etf] AND board = 'TQBR' AND ( minute >= $__fromTime AND minute <= $__toTime )
  GROUP by "minute", sec_code, buy_sell)
GROUP by sec_code
HAVING "разница объемов" > 0
ORDER by "разница объемов" desc
LIMIT 10

select sec_code, sum(vol) as vol FROM (
 SELECT sec_code, sum(price * quantity * s.lotsize) as vol
 FROM "default"."transaq_trades"
          JOIN default.transaq_securities s
               on (transaq_trades.secid = s.secid and transaq_trades.board = s.board)
 WHERE sec_code not in [$sec_code_etf]
   AND board = 'TQBR'
   AND (time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime)
   AND (buy_sell = 'B')
 GROUP By sec_code    
 UNION ALL
 SELECT sec_code, sum(price * quantity * s.lotsize)*-1 as vol
 FROM "default"."transaq_trades"
          JOIN default.transaq_securities s
               on (transaq_trades.secid = s.secid and transaq_trades.board = s.board)
 WHERE sec_code not in [$sec_code_etf] AND board = 'TQBR'
   AND (time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime)
   AND (buy_sell = 'S')
 GROUP By sec_code  
 ) GROUP by sec_code ORDER by vol desc LIMIT 10

select sec_code, sum(vol)*-1 as vol FROM (
  SELECT sec_code, sum(price * quantity * s.lotsize) as vol
  FROM "default"."transaq_trades" JOIN default.transaq_securities s on (transaq_trades.secid = s.secid and transaq_trades.board = s.board)
  WHERE sec_code not in [$sec_code_etf]
    AND board = 'TQBR'
    AND (time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime)
    AND (buy_sell = 'B')
  GROUP By sec_code 
  UNION ALL
  SELECT sec_code, sum(price * quantity * s.lotsize)*-1 as vol
  FROM "default"."transaq_trades" JOIN default.transaq_securities s on (transaq_trades.secid = s.secid and transaq_trades.board = s.board)
  WHERE sec_code not in [$sec_code_etf] AND board = 'TQBR'
    AND (time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime)
    AND (buy_sell = 'S')
  GROUP By sec_code  
 ) GROUP by sec_code ORDER by vol desc LIMIT 10

SELECT time, topK(10)(sec_code) as "sec", sum(quantity) as "vol"
FROM "default"."transaq_trades"
WHERE quantity = 1 AND buy_sell = 'B' AND ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime )
GROUP by time, sec_code
HAVING vol > 1
ORDER BY time

SELECT minute , sum(vol) as "разница объемов" FROM (
  SELECT toStartOfInterval(time, INTERVAL ${interval} MINUTE) as "minute", if(buy_sell == 'S', -1, 1) * sum(price * quantity * s.lotsize) as "vol"
  FROM "default"."transaq_trades" JOIN default.transaq_securities s on (transaq_trades.sec_code = s.seccode and transaq_trades.board = s.board)
  WHERE sec_code in [$sec_code] AND board = 'TQBR' AND ( minute >= $__fromTime AND minute <= $__toTime )
  GROUP by "minute", buy_sell)
GROUP by "minute"
ORDER BY minute

SELECT minute , sum(vol) as "разница объемов" FROM (
  SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp_add(day, 1, time), INTERVAL ${interval} MINUTE) as "minute", if(buy_sell == 'S', -1, 1) * sum(price * quantity * s.lotsize) as "vol"
  FROM "default"."transaq_trades" JOIN default.transaq_securities s on (transaq_trades.sec_code = s.seccode and transaq_trades.board = s.board)
  WHERE sec_code in [$sec_code] AND board = 'TQBR' AND ( minute >= $__fromTime AND minute <= $__toTime )
  GROUP by "minute", buy_sell)
GROUP by "minute"
ORDER BY minute

panels.title: Volume trades $sec_code by interval $interval в минутах

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toStartOfInterval(time, INTERVAL $interval MINUTE) as "minute", sum(price * quantity * s.lotsize) as "объем" FROM "default"."transaq_trades" 
JOIN default.transaq_securities s on (transaq_trades.secid = s.secid and transaq_trades.board = s.board)
WHERE sec_code in [$sec_code] AND board = 'TQBR' AND ( minute >= $__fromTime AND minute <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'B' ) GROUP by "minute" ORDER BY minute

SELECT toStartOfInterval(time, INTERVAL $interval MINUTE) as "minute", sum(price * quantity * s.lotsize) * -1 as "объем" 
FROM "default"."transaq_trades"
JOIN default.transaq_securities s on (transaq_trades.secid = s.secid and transaq_trades.board = s.board)
WHERE sec_code in [$sec_code] AND board = 'TQBR' AND ( minute >= $__fromTime AND minute <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'S' ) GROUP by minute ORDER BY minute

panels.title: Volume trades $sec_code by interval $interval в минутах

targets.rawSql: SELECT time, sum(quantity) as "лот" FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE sec_code in [$sec_code] AND ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'B' ) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT time, sum(quantity)*-1 as "лот" FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE sec_code in [$sec_code] AND ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'S' ) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT time, count(price) as "count" FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE sec_code in [$sec_code] AND ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'B' ) GROUP by time ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT time, count(price)* -1 as "count" FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE sec_code in [$sec_code] AND ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'S' ) GROUP by time ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT minute , sum(vol) as "разница объемов" FROM (
  SELECT toStartOfInterval(time, INTERVAL ${interval} MINUTE) as "minute", if(buy_sell == 'S', -1, 1) * sum(price * quantity * s.lotsize) as "vol"
  FROM "default"."transaq_trades" JOIN default.transaq_securities s on (transaq_trades.sec_code = s.seccode and transaq_trades.board = s.board)
  WHERE sec_code not in [$sec_code_etf] AND board = 'TQBR' AND ( minute >= $__fromTime AND minute <= $__toTime )
  GROUP by "minute", buy_sell)
GROUP by "minute"
ORDER BY minute

SELECT minute , sum(vol) as "разница объемов" FROM (
  SELECT toStartOfInterval(timestamp_add(day, 1, time), INTERVAL ${interval} MINUTE) as "minute", if(buy_sell == 'S', -1, 1) * sum(price * quantity * s.lotsize) as "vol"
  FROM "default"."transaq_trades" JOIN default.transaq_securities s on (transaq_trades.sec_code = s.seccode and transaq_trades.board = s.board)
  WHERE sec_code not in [$sec_code_etf] AND board = 'TQBR' AND ( minute >= $__fromTime AND minute <= $__toTime )
  GROUP by "minute", buy_sell)
GROUP by "minute"
ORDER BY minute

panels.title: Volume trades IMOEX diff with buy ad sell by interval $interval в минутах

targets.rawSql: SELECT toStartOfInterval(time, INTERVAL $interval MINUTE) as "minute", sum(price * quantity) as "объем" FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE ( minute >= $__fromTime AND minute <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'B' ) AND sec_code not in [$sec_code_etf] AND board = 'TQBR' GROUP by "minute" ORDER BY minute ASC LIMIT 10000

SELECT toStartOfInterval(time, INTERVAL $interval MINUTE) as "minute", sum(price * quantity)*-1 as "объем" FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE ( minute >= $__fromTime AND minute <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'S' ) AND sec_code not in [$sec_code_etf] AND board = 'TQBR' GROUP by minute ORDER BY minute ASC LIMIT 10000

panels.title: Volume trades IMOEX by interval $interval в минутах

targets.rawSql: SELECT toStartOfInterval(time, INTERVAL $interval MINUTE) as "minute", sum(price * quantity) as "объем" FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE ( minute >= $__fromTime AND minute <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'B' ) AND sec_code in [$sec_code_etf] GROUP by "minute" ORDER BY minute ASC LIMIT 10000

SELECT toStartOfInterval(time, INTERVAL $interval MINUTE) as "minute", sum(price * quantity)*-1 as "объем" FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE  sec_code in [$sec_code_etf] AND ( minute >= $__fromTime AND minute <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'S' ) GROUP by minute ORDER BY minute ASC LIMIT 10000

panels.title: Volume trades ETF by interval $interval в минутах

targets.rawSql: SELECT time, sum(price * quantity) as "vol" FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'B' ) AND sec_code not in [$sec_code_etf] GROUP BY time ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT time, sum(price * quantity)*-1 as "vol" FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND ( buy_sell = 'S' ) AND sec_code not in [$sec_code_etf] GROUP BY time  ORDER BY time ASC

list.definition: SELECT sec_code FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) GROUP by sec_code ORDER BY sec_code ASC LIMIT 1000
list.label: Инструмент
list.name: sec_code
list.query: SELECT sec_code FROM "default"."transaq_trades" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) GROUP by sec_code ORDER BY sec_code ASC LIMIT 1000

list.definition:
select sec_code from transaq_trades
join default.transaq_securities t on transaq_trades.secid = t.secid
where board = 'TQTF' AND  time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime GROUP BY sec_code
list.label: ETF
list.name: sec_code_etf
list.query:
select sec_code from transaq_trades
join default.transaq_securities t on transaq_trades.secid = t.secid
where board = 'TQTF' AND  time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime GROUP BY sec_code
